column5: Thanks for the link Stephen. I checked out the site and it looks good. Do you think it has indoor or outdoor toilets? What about running water? I'm assuming they must. Do rooms come with separate bathrooms or is there only one per floor. Do they have T.V. way up there?
The Bristol has a toilet and shower in every room, and it had hot water for all 4 of us. And I highly recomend the Columbia restaurant.
The Bristol has a toilet and shower in every room, and it had hot water for all 4 of us. And I highly recomend the Columbia restaurant.
The Mystic Isle just south of town. Its the cleanest motel I've stayed in aroud there. Also, the restaurant just down the hill from them (the Cedarhof) is known through out Ontario for its food.
The Mystic Isle just south of town. Its the cleanest motel I've stayed in aroud there. Also, the restaurant just down the hill from them (the Cedarhof) is known through out Ontario for its food.
I just happened to be looking up the numbers for our trip in July. The Bristol(I've stayed there twice and it was fine) (705)856-2385, Sportsman is (705) 856-2272.

Ha, ha, ha, ha....that is truly hilarious...a decent motel in Wawa...ha, ha, ha, ha, please stop, it's too funny...ha, ha, ha, ouch, my side hurts...decent motel in Wawa...ha, ha, ha,...please, someone slap me...ha, ha, ha.

Ha, ha, ha, ha....that is truly hilarious...a decent motel in Wawa...ha, ha, ha, ha, please stop, it's too funny...ha, ha, ha, ouch, my side hurts...decent motel in Wawa...ha, ha, ha,...please, someone slap me...ha, ha, ha.

I'd like to slap you....you miss the important things in life. When I go fishing in Canada, those motels are just fine. WHen I go vacationing in Boca, I stay at the Boca Resort. Different times, different needs

I'd like to slap you....you miss the important things in life. When I go fishing in Canada, those motels are just fine. WHen I go vacationing in Boca, I stay at the Boca Resort. Different times, different needs
Bristol Motel Has a web site as follows. www.bristolmotel.comSteve.
Bristol Motel Has a web site as follows. www.bristolmotel.comSteve.
You said it, JZ. When I'm getting ready to spend a week in the bush, I'm not in the market for a bunch of luxuries . Something reasonably priced, quiet, and clean is plenty good enough.
You said it, JZ. When I'm getting ready to spend a week in the bush, I'm not in the market for a bunch of luxuries . Something reasonably priced, quiet, and clean is plenty good enough.

Thanks for the link Stephen. I checked out the site and it looks good. Do you think it has indoor or outdoor toilets? What about running water? I'm assuming they must. Do rooms come with separate bathrooms or is there only one per floor. Do they have T.V. way up there?

I stayed at the Bristol last year and it was fine. As I recall it was about 60 or so Canadian and it was very clean. It passed my wife's cleanliness test so that says something. We ate at the Columbia restaurant and it was very good too. I plan to do both next year.

I stayed at the Bristol last year and it was fine. As I recall it was about 60 or so Canadian and it was very clean. It passed my wife's cleanliness test so that says something. We ate at the Columbia restaurant and it was very good too. I plan to do both next year.

I'm going up to Lake Kabinakigami. Great place to fish. Flying out of Hawk Junction. Been going there a couple years now and find the 2nd week of the season to be the best. Usually miss the mosquitos and black flies but it's looking kinda warm there so far and think they might get me this year. Thanks for the replies all. Booked a chalet at the Motor in. Great price of $111 (US) for 6 of us. FISH ON!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I always stop and get a cone there no matter the temp!!!!
I always stop and get a cone there no matter the temp!!!!
I tried to get the Beaver, but they only had single rooms left for that night. I believe they're only $40/night. From what I hear they're clean and not too bad
I tried to get the Beaver, but they only had single rooms left for that night. I believe they're only $40/night. From what I hear they're clean and not too bad
anyone have any phone numbers for these places?
anyone have any phone numbers for these places?
I just happened to be looking up the numbers for our trip in July. The Bristol(I've stayed there twice and it was fine) (705)856-2385, Sportsman is (705) 856-2272.
Looking for a decent hotel/motel for 6 people on the night of the 22nd of May. Can anyone recommend a decent (i.e. not too expensive, not too dirty) place for the night? Thanks alot
The Wawa Motor Inn is the best I've found in that town. They have so larger chalets in the back that are pretty nice.
whereabouts are you headed for fishing???.we will be going up through wawa about a week later than you...headed towards our trip also..
We stay at the Pennisula Inn just to the west of Wawa (1-2miles). Cheap rooms (single $65 Cdn) they also have a restaurant.. Happy fishin..

Don't forget to stop at Young's for an ice cream cone!! Ha Ha I wouldn't feel like I had been to Wawa unless I had stopped at Young's. Wawa Motor Inn gets our visit also as we pass thru every year. I don't know about this year as we are taking our Lab with us on her first annual fly-in trip. Wife said it might be first and last too!!

Don't forget to stop at Young's for an ice cream cone!! Ha Ha I wouldn't feel like I had been to Wawa unless I had stopped at Young's. Wawa Motor Inn gets our visit also as we pass thru every year. I don't know about this year as we are taking our Lab with us on her first annual fly-in trip. Wife said it might be first and last too!!
Has anyone stayed at the Beaver Hotel? Looks nice from the outside. We're looking for a different place to stay ... our previous place is going downhill.
Has anyone stayed at the Beaver Hotel? Looks nice from the outside. We're looking for a different place to stay ... our previous place is going downhill.

I have stayed at the Bristol Motel, Sportsmans Motel, Wawa Motor Inn.I like the Sportsmans Motel but the restaurant at the Wawa Motor Inn is convenient. The last time I went through Wawa I noticed that the Wawa Motor Inn was getting a face lift.Steve.
